headline: Show HN: Fullstack Serverless Apps
description:
## tldr

You can deploy javascript apps on Cyclic after logging in with GH. Quick starts: https://docs.cyclic.sh/docs/overview/starters

## Description

At my last job I saw new developers struggle to get experiments and POCs from their local to live in the cloud. As we continue to expand the software development profession, more developers will need this same help. So we built cyclic.sh. Our aim is to empower even the most junior developer with robust infrastructure and deployments that just work. We can build and deploy your code in less time than it took to read this paragraph.

## What works now

- Zero-config build, deploy and hosting of javascript apps

- Github integration supporting 'push to deploy'

- Branch based builds

- Auto-scaling Serverless backend (including )

- Custom sub-domains and custom domains

- Token based authentication

- Integrated single-table DB on top of AWS DynamoDB (in preview)

## Limits/Constraints

https://docs.cyclic.sh/docs/overview/limits

## Ask

Let us know what you think and what we need to add to make it so awesome you would start using it for all your projects.

Built with joy by:

- Mike (https://github.com/korostelevm)

- Kam (https://github.com/seekayel)
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 全栈式无服务器应用程序
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 全棧式無服務器應用程序
description_zh-Hans:
## tldr

用GH登录后，你可以在Cyclic上部署javascript应用程序。快速启动。https://docs.cyclic.sh/docs/overview/starters

##描述

在我的上一份工作中，我看到新的开发人员努力将实验和POCs从本地转移到云中生活。随着我们继续扩大软件开发行业，更多的开发者将需要同样的帮助。所以我们建立了cyclic.sh。我们的目标是让最初级的开发者也能拥有强大的基础设施和部署，并能正常工作。We can build and deploy your code in less time than it took to read this paragraph.

## What works now

- Zero-config build, deploy and hosting of javascript apps

- Github integration supporting 'push to deploy'

- Branch based builds

- Auto-scaling Serverless backend (including )

- Custom sub-domains and custom domains

- Token based authentication

- Integrated single-table DB on top of AWS DynamoDB (in preview)

## Limits/Constraints

https://docs.cyclic.sh/docs/overview/limits

## Ask

Let us know what you think and what we need to add to make it so awesome you would start using it for all your projects.

- Mike (https://github.com/korostelevm)

- Kam (https://github.com/seekayel)
